speaker: POMPEY
text: I am as well acquainted here as I was in our

speaker: POMPEY
text: house of profession. One would think it were Mistress

speaker: POMPEY
text: Overdone’s own house, for here be many of

speaker: POMPEY
text: her old customers. First, here’s young Master Rash.

speaker: POMPEY
text: He’s in for a commodity of brown paper and old

speaker: POMPEY
text: ginger, ninescore and seventeen pounds, of which

speaker: POMPEY
text: he made five marks ready money. Marry, then

speaker: POMPEY
text: ginger was not much in request, for the old women

speaker: POMPEY
text: were all dead. Then is there here one Master Caper,

speaker: POMPEY
text: at the suit of Master Three-pile the mercer, for some

speaker: POMPEY
text: four suits of peach-colored satin, which now

speaker: POMPEY
text: peaches him a beggar. Then have we here young

speaker: POMPEY
text: Dizzy and young Master Deep-vow, and Master

speaker: POMPEY
text: Copper-spur and Master Starve-lackey the rapier-and-dagger

speaker: POMPEY
text: man, and young Drop-heir that killed

speaker: POMPEY
text: lusty Pudding, and Master Forth-light the tilter, and

speaker: POMPEY
text: brave Master Shoe-tie the great traveler, and wild

speaker: POMPEY
text: Half-can that stabbed Pots, and I think forty more,

speaker: POMPEY
text: all great doers in our trade, and are now “for the

speaker: POMPEY
text: Lord’s sake.”

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Sirrah, bring Barnardine hither.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Master Barnardine, you must rise

speaker: POMPEY
text: and be hanged, Master Barnardine.

speaker: ABHORSON
text: What ho, Barnardine!

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: A pox o’ your throats! Who makes

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: that noise there? What are you?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Your friends,

speaker: POMPEY
text: sir, the hangman. You must be so good, sir, to rise

speaker: POMPEY
text: and be put to death.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: Away, you rogue, away! I am

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: sleepy.

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Tell him he must awake, and

speaker: ABHORSON
text: that quickly too.

speaker: POMPEY
text: Pray, Master Barnardine, awake till

speaker: POMPEY
text: you are executed, and sleep afterwards.

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Go in to him, and fetch him out.

speaker: POMPEY
text: He is coming, sir, he is coming. I hear his

speaker: POMPEY
text: straw rustle.

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Is the axe upon the block, sirrah?

speaker: POMPEY
text: Very ready, sir.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: How now, Abhorson? What’s the news

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: with you?

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Truly, sir, I would desire you to clap into

speaker: ABHORSON
text: your prayers, for, look you, the warrant’s come.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: You rogue, I have been drinking all night.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: I am not fitted for ’t.

speaker: POMPEY
text: O, the better, sir, for he that drinks all night

speaker: POMPEY
text: and is hanged betimes in the morning may sleep the

speaker: POMPEY
text: sounder all the next day.

speaker: ABHORSON
text: Look you, sir, here comes

speaker: ABHORSON
text: your ghostly father. Do we jest now, think you?

speaker: DUKE
text: Sir, induced by my

speaker: DUKE
text: charity, and hearing how hastily you are to depart, I

speaker: DUKE
text: am come to advise you, comfort you, and pray with

speaker: DUKE
text: you.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: Friar, not I. I have been drinking hard all

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: night, and I will have more time to prepare me, or

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: they shall beat out my brains with billets. I will not

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: consent to die this day, that’s certain.

speaker: DUKE
text: O, sir, you must. And therefore I

speaker: DUKE
text: beseech you look forward on the journey you shall

speaker: DUKE
text: go.

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: I swear I will not die today for any man’s

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: persuasion.

speaker: DUKE
text: But hear you—

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: Not a word. If you have anything to say to

speaker: BARNARDINE
text: me, come to my ward, for thence will not I today.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Good even, friar, where’s the Provost?

speaker: DUKE
text: Not within, sir.

speaker: LUCIO
text: O, pretty Isabella, I am pale at mine heart to see

speaker: LUCIO
text: thine eyes so red. Thou must be patient. I am fain to

speaker: LUCIO
text: dine and sup with water and bran. I dare not for my

speaker: LUCIO
text: head fill my belly. One fruitful meal would set me to

speaker: LUCIO
text: ’t. But they say the Duke will be here tomorrow. By

speaker: LUCIO
text: my troth, Isabel, I loved thy brother. If the old

speaker: LUCIO
text: fantastical duke of dark corners had been at home,

speaker: LUCIO
text: he had lived.

speaker: DUKE
text: Sir, the Duke is marvelous little beholding

speaker: DUKE
text: to your reports, but the best is, he lives not

speaker: DUKE
text: in them.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Friar, thou knowest not the Duke so well as I do.

speaker: LUCIO
text: He’s a better woodman than thou tak’st him for.

speaker: DUKE
text: Well, you’ll answer this one day. Fare

speaker: DUKE
text: you well.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Nay, tarry, I’ll go along with thee. I can tell thee

speaker: LUCIO
text: pretty tales of the Duke.

speaker: DUKE
text: You have told me too many of him

speaker: DUKE
text: already, sir, if they be true; if not true, none were

speaker: DUKE
text: enough.

speaker: LUCIO
text: I was once before him for getting a wench with

speaker: LUCIO
text: child.

speaker: DUKE
text: Did you such a thing?

speaker: LUCIO
text: Yes, marry, did I, but I was fain to forswear it.

text: They would else have married me to the rotten

speaker: LUCIO
text: medlar.

speaker: DUKE
text: Sir, your company is fairer than honest.

speaker: DUKE
text: Rest you well.

speaker: LUCIO
text: By my troth, I’ll go with thee to the lane’s end. If

speaker: LUCIO
text: bawdy talk offend you, we’ll have very little of it.

speaker: LUCIO
text: Nay, friar, I am a kind of burr. I shall stick.
